SELECT cp.code AS companyCode , cp.name AS companyName , cp.business_number AS businessNum , cp.taxcode AS taxCode , cp.owner AS owner , cp.contact AS contact , cp.address AS companyAddress , cp.account AS companyAccount , cp.company_size AS companySize , cp.category AS companyCategory , cp.sales AS companySales , cp.deal_type AS dealType , cp.domestic_foreign AS domestic , cp.currency AS contractCurrency , cp.start_date AS startDate , cp.end_date AS endDate , cp.invoice_issue AS invoiceIssue FROM tbl_company cp
AND cp.code = #{ companyCode }
AND cp.name LIKE '%'||#{ companyName }||'%'
AND cp.business_number LIKE '%'||#{ businessNum }||'%'
AND cp.taxcode LIKE '%'||#{ taxCode }||'%'
AND cp.owner LIKE '%'||#{ owner }||'%'
AND cp.contact LIKE '%'||#{ owner }||'%'
AND cp.address LIKE '%'||#{ companyAddress }||'%'
AND cp.account LIKE '%'||#{ companyAccount }||'%'
AND cp.company_size = #{ companySize }
AND cp.category LIKE '%'||#{ companyCategory }||'%'
AND cp.category LIKE '%'||#{ companySales }||'%'
AND cp.deal_type LIKE '%'||#{ dealType }||'%'
AND cp.domestic_foreign LIKE '%'||#{ domestic }||'%'
AND cp.currency LIKE '%'||#{ contractCurrency }||'%'
AND #{ startDate } < p.order_date AND p.order_date < #{ endDate }
AND sysdate < p.order_date AND p.order_date < #{ endDate }
AND sysdate < p.order_date AND p.order_date < sysdate
AND cp.invoice_issue LIKE '%'||#{ invoiceIssue }||'%'

SELECT pt.partcode AS partCode , pt.partname AS partName , pt.nickname AS partNickname , pt.library AS partClass , pt.remark AS partRemark , pt.common AS common , pt.drw_no AS drawNum , pt.drw_img AS drawImage FROM tbl_part pt
AND pt.partcode = #{ partCode }
AND pt.partname LIKE '%'||#{ partName }||'%'
AND pt.nickname LIKE '%'||#{ partNickname }||'%'
AND pt.library LIKE '%'||#{ partClass }||'%'
AND pt.remark LIKE '%'||#{ partRemark }||'%'
AND pt.common LIKE '%'||#{ common }||'%'
AND pt.drw_no LIKE '%'||#{ drawNum }||'%'
AND pt.drw_img LIKE '%'||#{ drawImage }||'%'
